channel.title: 667 --- help pls - Resolved
channel.description:
i have a lucky ags in my server, how can i give it the same spec as a reg ags?
basicly how do i add ags spec to an ags that hasn't alrady got it coded in?
if you don't know personally, if you know of a guide that will help, pls link it.
thx,
grandstinger

item.title: 667 --- help pls - Resolved
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

This is going to take two steps:

First, the server needs to send the special bar interface. To send the same spec bar as the AGS, search for the item id of the ags (should be 11694) and add handling for the item id of your lucky ags too.

Secondly, you need to add the actual spec. Again, just search using the AGS item id and add the id for the lucky AGS as another condition. This could end up looking like any of the such, where XXXX is the item id of the lucky AGS:

case XXXX:
case 11694:

*********

if(itemId == 11694 || itemId == XXXX)

Read full topic

item.title: 667 --- help pls - Resolved
item.dc:creator: @Death_Style Death Style
item.description:
@Death_Style wrote:

find the id of the ags and search your source for where it’s being handled

the lucky items aren’t supposed to have specials btw

Read full topic
